item.title: Enriching Anomali and Other TIPS with MDTI Feeds
item.description:
Prerequisites
Microsoft Sentinel Log Analytics workspace Enabled Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence Data Connector Azure Logic Apps Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence API Access and Client App Registered Anomali ThreatStream API Credentials Access to the MDTI Feed playbook
Introduction
Ever-evolving cloud computing innovations have provided immeasurable benefits to individuals and businesses by publicly making technology available. Unfortunately, cybercriminals exploit this availability using a wide range of digital infrastructure to commit their attacks. With this growing dig...
